name: Vampire: Outcasts
description:
Follow the story of our 3 main characters, and how their stories intersect with the Second Inquisition hot on their tails.

This game was made so that even someone that know nothing about Vampire the Masquerade would be able to play and enjoy the game.

Visual Novel for the "Vampire the Masquerade" game jam.

PC version should also work on Linux.
